text_body: In order to participate in this study you must be wearing
headphones. If you are not already doing so, please take a moment
now to put on your headphones.
On the following screens, you will calibrate your listening
volume and perform a simple listening task to ensure your headphones
are set up correctly. Please follow the instructions carefully.
Successful completion of this task is required to continue with
the experiment. If the task is not completed successfuly, the
